code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../api/api';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ServiceDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[service,setService]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{api.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/v1/products/${id}`).then(response=>setService(response.data)).catch(error=>{alert('Услуга не найдена');navigate('/');});},[id,navigate]);if(!service)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u0417\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0437\u043A\u0430..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",style:{padding:'40px 0'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:service.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service.full_description||service.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{fontSize:'18px',fontWeight:'bold',marginTop:'20px'},children:["\u0426\u0435\u043D\u0430: ",service.price," \u0440\u0443\u0431/\u043C\u0435\u0441\u044F\u0446"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"detail-btn",style:{marginTop:'20px'},onClick:()=>navigate(-1),children:"\u0412\u0435\u0440\u043D\u0443\u0442\u044C\u0441\u044F \u043D\u0430\u0437\u0430\u0434"})]})});};export default ServiceDetails;
